text: This is a list of moths of the subfamily Arctiinae that are found in South Africa. It also acts as an index to the species articles and forms part of the full List of moths of South Africa. *Acantharctia latifasciata Hampson, 1909 *Acantharctia vittata Aurivillius, 1900 *Afrasura ichorina (Butler, 1877) *Afrasura obliterata (Walker, 1864) *Afrasura rivulosa (Walker, 1854) *Afrospilarctia dissimilis (Distant, 1897) *Afrospilarctia flavida (Bartel, 1903) *Aglossosia title: List of moths of South Africa (Arctiinae)
